short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CSS tools to aid in use of the Silph Arena.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CSS tools to aid in use of the Silph Arena. Currently includes full page matchups on tournament matchup screens, as well as utilities for displaying on larger screens.
This extension is not affiliated with the Silph Arena or The Silph Road in any way.
